text: Is A Third Attempt The Charm I ve tried twice before   Obviously I failed  although second attempt docs said I was only a few MG away from lethal    I feel myself going down the same path   Not out of hopelessness  but because I m tired   I m emotionally tired    I have a unique condition that some would call a photographic memory   It s a wonderful thing to have in academics  but life isn t academics   Have you ever heard the saying   Forgive and forget   Not only do I never forget  but my mind also conjures up the emotions attached to the memory   I mentally cannot forgive because if I remember how somebody hurt me  I instantly feel the same pain I felt the day they hurt me   This is all but killed my capacity to love  because with love  even healthy love  comes pain   Think of it this way  you see a scar on your body   Imagine reliving the pain the wound created   The medication I m on numbs me  but I ve come off of it   So the pain has returned   So I m tired   I feel like I ve done the best I can and I just really don t want to do it anymore   I really don t
summary: The third time is the charm for a person with a photographic memory. It's killed her capacity to love. The medication numbs her, but she's come off it and the pain has returned. She's tired and doesn't want to do it anymore.

text: What if you are just plain tired of it all I am a older woman  with a job  house  and husband that loves me  There is nothing bad or painful in my life   I just think ahead to the   or   years of waking up  going to work  coming home  having dinner and going to sleep  and then doing it a million more times   Slowly my body will degenerate  my mental faculties will slow down   All of this punctuated by brief travel to other places where I wake up  walk around that other place  eat dinner and go to sleep   Wheee   I just keep getting the feeling it would be nice to just move on   Maybe there is something to move on to  maybe just oblivion   Either way Ground Hog day would finally be over
